headers.value: default-src 'self' *.vercel.app vercel.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.vercel.app vercel.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.vercel.app; img-src 'self' data: blob: *.vercel.app vercel.com; font-src 'self' *.vercel.app; connect-src 'self' *.vercel.app vercel.com; media-src 'self' *.vercel.app; object-src 'none'; frame-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests
geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=(), payment=(), fullscreen=(), browsing-topics=()
